Deities @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Alglenweis], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Apsu], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Ardad Lili], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Brigh], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Casandalee], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Daikitsu], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Doloras], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Dwarven Pantheon], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Elven Pantheon], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Falayna], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Findeladlara], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Grandmother Spider], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Lady Jingxi], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Likha], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Mammon], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Monad], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Nocticula], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Otolmens], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Pillars of Knowledge], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Shelyn], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Soralyon], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.The Prismatic Ray], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Tlehar], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Torag], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Uvuko], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Yuelral]

Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Splash of Art]; Advanced Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Artistic Flourish]

You have divine abilities related to crafting and art.
name: Creation Domain
